name: podamShouldHandleConstructorsWithGenericArraysDuringPojoInstantiation

testSteps.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.GenericArrayInConstructorPojo with specific types {class java.lang.String}
Then the pojo uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.GenericArrayInConstructorPojo@1951811 must be of the type class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.GenericArrayInConstructorPojo
Then the given array should not be null or empty and contain elements of type class java.lang.String

title: Podam should handle constructors with generic arrays during Pojo instantiation
